item.title: Two Kinds of Code Review
item.author: taylor@teukka.tech (taylor thompson)
item.description: One goal of a review process is good code. Another goal of a review is good coders. The review is a perfect mentorship opportunity, it is a way to increase contributorâ€™s TRM.
